The Context Loss Problem

Without PAELLADOC

AI development teams struggle with:

  • Knowledge silos between team members
  • Decisions without historical context
  • Reinventing solutions to already-solved problems
  • Poor handoffs between developers

With PAELLADOC

Teams experience:

  • Comprehensive knowledge sharing
  • Clear decision history and rationale
  • Reusable solutions to common problems
  • Smooth developer transitions

Simple Implementation

Example PAELLADOC implementation Terminal 
PAELLA project_name="AI Chatbot" language="en"

# Follow the interactive documentation process
# Document as you go with simple commands:

ACHIEVEMENT description="Implemented context window management" category="development"
DECISION impact="architecture" rationale="Chose transformer-based approach for better performance"
